The Heat ( 25 - 32 ) came in to the contest with a lot of swings , as they opened up a 17 - point lead by the end of the first quarter and never looked back . In fact , the Heat ( 25 - 32 ) led by double - digits for the majority of the game , but the Heat were able to pull away in the fourth quarter , outscoring the Rockets 29 - 36 in the final period . James Harden finished with a game - high 38 points , 12 rebounds and 12 assists on 10 - of - 21 shooting , including 4 - of - 10 from behind the arc and 14 - of - 16 from the free throw line . Dion Waiters was the only other starter to score in double figures , finishing with 23 points on 8 - of - 17 shooting , along with seven rebounds , seven assists and 0 steal , in 37 minutes . Ryan Anderson chipped in 17 points , along with six rebounds , in 31 minutes off the bench , while Tyler Johnson chipped in 16 points off the bench . The Heat shot 52 percent from the field and 37 percent from long range , while the Rockets shot 41 percent from the field . Hassan Whiteside was the only other player to score in double digits for the Heat , as he finished with 23 points , to go along with 14 rebounds , five blocks and one assist , in 31 minutes . Tyler Johnson followed up with 16 points on 6 - of - 11 shooting , in 33 minutes off the bench , while Clint Capela double - doubled with 2 points and 12 rebounds . The Heat will look to bounce back , as they play host to the Pistons on Monday .
The New Orleans Pelicans defeated the Detroit Pistons , 109 - 86 , at Smoothie King Center on Wednesday . The Pelicans were expected to win this game easily , but it took a late run to escape with a win . In fact , there were 11 ties and 17 lead changes in total , with neither team leading by more than 11 points . Defense was key for New Orleans , as they held Detroit to 39 percent from the field and 13 percent from three - point range . Rebounding was a huge factor for the Pelicans , as they won that battle , 53 - 50 . The Pelicans ( 24 - 37 ) have now won three - straight games , as they continue to slide down the standings . Anthony Davis was the player of the game , as he tallied 33 points , 14 rebounds and three assists on 11 - of - 17 shooting . Jrue Holiday finished second on the team with 22 points , four rebounds and five assists . Andre Drummond recorded a double - double , totaling 13 points and 17 rebounds . Jon Leuer led the bench in scoring , as he provided 22 points and seven rebounds . On deck for the Pistons is a road matchup against the Houston Rockets on Monday . The Pelicans ( 24 - 37 ) have been one of the best teams in the league in recent weeks and losses like this show just how scary they can be . The Pacers were led by Kevin Love , who scored 22 points ( 9 - 18 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt ) to go with 19 rebounds , two assists , three blocks and 0 steal in 39 minutes . Tristan Thompson recorded a double - double with 16 points ( 7 - 8 FG , 2 - 4 FT ) and eight rebounds in 30 minutes . The Cavaliers were led by Paul George , who scored 32 points ( 11 - 21 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 7 - 8 FT ) with 11 rebounds and dished out six assists on 11 - of - 21 shooting . George Hill had 14 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 0 - 5 3Pt ) , five assists and five rebounds in 40 minutes . The Houston Rockets defeated the host New Orleans Pelicans , 122 - 100 , at Smoothie King Center on Wednesday . The Rockets were expected to win this game easily and they left no doubt with this near wire - to - wire win . In fact , the Rockets outscored the Pelicans , 35 - 21 , in the third quarter . Shooting was the key difference , with Houston shooting 45 percent , while holding the Pelicans to just 41 percent from the field . The Rockets also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording eight more assists than New Orleans , while committing five less turnovers . The Rockets ( 20 - 7 ) had to play this game without Omer Holiday and Chandler Tyreke Evans , but they did n't have enough to win this game . James Harden was the player of the game , as he accumulated 29 points , 11 rebounds and 13 assists . Anthony Davis was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 19 points and five rebounds . Patrick Beverley recorded a double - double , totaling 13 points and 11 rebounds on 5 - of - 10 shooting . Buddy Hield led the team in scoring , dropping 11 points on 4 - of - 10 from the field . Jrue Holiday was the only other Pelican to reach double figures in scoring , accruing 11 points , five rebounds and one assist . The Rockets will look to get out of this slide on Wednesday in a road matchup against the New York Knicks . The Rockets ( 20 - 7 ) have been one of the hottest teams in the league right now and this win may be a drastic understatement . Eric Gordon was the only other starter in double figures , as he amassed 29 points , 1 assists and a steal . The Rockets will look to keep rolling on Friday against the Minnesota Timberwolves .

The Wizards were led by Monta Ellis , who scored a game - high 34 points ( 10 - 21 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 12 - 14 FT ) , to go along with four assists , one rebound and one steal . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 46 points and 13 rebounds over his last two games . Bradley Beal also had a solid game , finishing with 21 points ( 9 - 17 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt ) , three assists and one steal in 26 minutes . The only other player to reach double figures in points was Brandan Wright , who went 6 - for - 7 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score 14 points . The Mavericks ' next game will be on the road against the New York Knicks on Wednesday , while the Mavericks will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , as the Mavericks will travel to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday . Washington will be off until Wednesday when they take on the Lakers in New York . Dallas will return home to face a two - game homestand against the 76ers .

The Cavaliers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Raptors 26 - 33 in the first quarter alone . The Cavaliers were the superior shooters in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 35 percent from the three - point line , while the Raptors went 51 percent from the floor and 30 percent from beyond the arc . The Cavaliers were led by LeBron James , who recorded 35 points ( 12 - 21 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 9 - 9 FT ) , two rebounds , two steals and two blocked shots in 42 minutes . He 's now averaging 26 points and 12 assists on the season . Kyle Lowry also had a solid showing , scoring 16 points ( 6 - 18 FG , 2 - 8 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , to go along with 14 assists and 1 steals . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 30 points and 7 rebounds over his last two games . Kyrie Irving also had 18 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 1 FT ) and a career - high of 3 steals . He 's now pushed his season averages to 15 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Kyrie Irving also played well off the bench , finishing with 18 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and 10 assists . He 's now averaging 13 points and 5 rebounds on the year . The Cavaliers ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Wednesday , while the Raptors will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Wednesday .

Redick paced the second unit with 14 points , 2 rebound and one assist . The 39 points were a new season - high for him , while the only other player to reach double figures was D'Angelo Russell , who finished with 13 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and three assists . The Trail Blazers were able to use a strong second half , out - scoring the Suns 42 - 22 , but were able to coast to a victory in front of their home crowd . The Blazers shot 44 percent from the field and 26 percent from the three - point line , while the Suns went 39 percent from the floor and a meager 26 percent from beyond the arc . The Trail Blazers were led by LaMarcus Aldridge , who finished with 19 points ( 7 - 18 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , 13 rebounds and two blocked shots . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 26 points and 20 rebounds over his last two games . Markieff Morris also had a strong game , finishing with 18 points ( 8 - 19 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 1 - 3 FT ) , while also adding eight rebounds and an assist . He 's now averaging 19 points and 6 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Wesley Matthews finished with 14 points ( 5 - 15 FG , 2 - 8 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) in 32 minutes . Damian Lillard had 13 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 0 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , four rebounds , three assists and two steals in 33 minutes . The Blazers ' next game will be on the road against the Los Angeles Lakers on Wednesday , while the Suns will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Friday .

The Atlanta Hawks defeated the Orlando Magic , 113 - 86 , at Phillips Arena on Saturday evening . The Hawks ( 30 - 21 ) got off to a hot start in the first quarter , jumping out to a 35 - 24 lead after one quarter . From there , the Hawks ( 30 - 21 ) managed to pull away in the second half , outscoring the Magic ( 20 - 33 ) by a 59 - 35 margin over the final 11 minutes . The Hawks were able to hang on for a much - needed win , as Tim Hardaway Jr. was a distant second with 21 points , two assists , five rebounds and two steals . Paul Millsap was right behind him with 21 points , five rebounds and four assists . The Miami Heat defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 108 - 90 , at Philips Arena on Wednesday . The Heat ( 26 - 32 ) checked in to Wednesday 's contest with a golden opportunity to keep their faint playoff hopes alive , as the Hawks ( 32 - 25 ) , on the second night of a back - to - back set . The Hawks ( 26 - 24 ) jumped out to a 25 - 24 lead after the first quarter and never looked back , as the Heat were able to pull away late in the fourth quarter , outscoring the Hawks 21 - 24 in the final period . Tyler Johnson led all scorers with 23 points , to go along with five rebounds and five assists on 9 - of - 11 shooting , while Tyler Johnson added 23 points , five rebounds , five assists and one steal in 26 minutes . Goran Dragic ( 17 ) , Rodney McGruder ( 13 ) , and Tim Hardaway Jr. ( 11 ) round out the Heat in double figures . The Heat shot just 40 percent from the field and 46 percent from behind the arc . Up next , the Heat will head home Wednesday to take on the Grizzlies , while the Hawks will look to continue their winning ways against the red - hot Hawks on Friday . Atlanta will look to extend their winning streak to four games Wednesday when they host the Pistons . Miami will look to get back on track as they play host to the Suns on Saturday . Atlanta will look to continue their winning ways against the Wizards on Saturday .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the host Los Angeles Lakers , 129 - 101 , at Staples Center on Wednesday . The Nuggets were expected to win this game easily , but they took care of business here in the second half . In fact , the Nuggets led for the entirety of the second half , as they outscored the Lakers by 25 points over the final three quarters . Free-throw shooting was a huge factor for the Nuggets , as they went 36 - of - 23 , while the Lakers hit just 16 - of - 32 from long distance . The Nuggets also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording five more assists than Los Angeles , while committing five less turnovers . The Nuggets ( 32 - 35 ) have now won five - straight games , as they continue to fall deeper out of the playoffs . Ivica Zubac was the player of the game , as he led the team with 25 points , 11 rebounds and an assist on 12 - of - 15 shooting . Nikola Jokic was second on the team , as he totaled 18 points , nine rebounds and four assists on 8 - of - 13 shooting . Mason Plumlee recorded a double - double , totaling 15 points , 10 rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Jamal Murray led the bench with 22 points , two rebounds , three assists and two steals . On deck for the Lakers is a home matchup against the Sacramento Kings on Monday . The Nuggets ( 32 - 35 ) have been one of the best teams in the league in recent weeks and losses like this show just how scary they can be . T.J. Zubac was the player of the game , as he tallied 25 points and 11 rebounds on 12 - of - 15 from the field . Jordan Clarkson was second on the team , as he accrued 19 points , two rebounds and three assists off the bench . Mason Plumlee recorded a double - double , totaling 15 points , 10 rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Mason Plumlee recorded a double - double , amassing 15 points , 10 rebounds , two assists , two blocks and a steal . Jamal Murray led the team in scoring , as he dropped 22 points on 8 - of - 13 shooting off the bench .
The Minnesota Timberwolves ( 25 - 49 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 20 - 54 ) 121 - 116 on Wednesday at the US Airways Center in Minnesota . The Timberwolves came out strong in this game , out - scoring the Suns 40 - 37 in the first quarter , but the Timberwolves were able to pull away in the final period . The Timberwolves were led by 30 points ( 10 - 18 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 6 FT ) from Brandon Knight , as he added five assists and two rebounds . The only other Timberwolve to reach double figures in points was Zach Len , who scored 15 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) to go with a career - high 1 rebounds , three steals , one assist and one block in 37 minutes . Mirza Teletovic led the way with 19 points ( 10 - 22 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 8 - 9 FT ) , to go along with four rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 26 minutes . The Suns shot 49 percent from the field and 46 percent from three - point land , but they were able to get to the free throw line a season - high 40 times from the line . The Timberwolves will look to bounce back , as they play host to the Spurs on Saturday . The Suns will look to get back on track as they host the Nuggets on Sunday . Phoenix will look to extend their winning streak to six games on Monday against the Lakers .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 1 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 0 - 0 ) , 112 - 94 , on Wednesday at the Moda Center in Portland . The Trail Blazers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pelicans 43 - 27 in the first quarter alone . The Blazers were the superior shooters in this game , going 50 percent from the field and 38 percent from the three - point line , while the Pelicans went 40 percent from the floor and 33 percent from beyond the arc . The Blazers were led by the duo of C.J . McCollum , who scored 37 points ( 14 - 22 FG , 6 - 9 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , to go along with six rebounds , one assist and one steal . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 38 points and 0 rebounds over his last two games . Ryan Anderson was the only other starter in double figures , finishing with 21 points ( 9 - 20 FG , 3 - 9 3Pt , 0 - 1 FT ) and nine rebounds . It was a season - high in points for him , as he 's now averaging 11 points per game on the season . The Blazers ' next game will be on the road against the Los Angeles Lakers on Wednesday , while New Orleans will travel to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Wednesday . The Trail Blazers will travel to Utah to play the Jazz on Wednesday .
The Golden State Warriors defeated the host Utah Jazz , 104 - 74 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Wednesday . The Warriors ( 25 - 4 ) learned earlier in the day that they would be without Tony Parker ( knee ) , but the Warriors ( 25 - 4 ) were able to pull out the win in the second half . The game was punctuated by a 19 - point first quarter from the first quarter , the Warriors never led by double - digits for the entirety of the game . The Warriors shot 44 percent from the field , while the Jazz shot 36 percent from the field and 30 percent from long range . Kevin Durant led the way for the Warriors , with 22 points on 8 - of - 14 shooting , five rebounds and one assist , in 25 minutes . Klay Thompson added 17 points , while Draymond Green added 15 points , 11 rebounds , four assists and five steals . Klay Thompson chipped in 17 points , while Joe Johnson chipped in 14 points on 5 - of - 9 shooting , in 22 minutes off the bench . The Warriors will look to bounce back , as they play host to the Suns on Monday . Meanwhile , the Jazz ( 18 - 11 ) have now won four of their last five games , as they have now lost five of their last four games . Stephen Curry was the high - point man for Utah , with 25 points , to go along with four assists , three rebounds and three steals , in 30 minutes . Klay Thompson chipped in 17 points , while Draymond Green added 15 points and four assists , to go along with 11 rebounds , in 31 minutes .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Golden State Warriors , 128 - 119 , at FedEx Forum on Friday . The Grizzlies ( 23 - 16 ) checked in to Thursday 's contest with a golden opportunity to keep their faint playoff hopes alive , as the Grizzlies ( 31 - 6 ) , on the second night of a back - to - back set . The Grizzlies ( 31 - 16 ) steamrolled the Warriors ( 23 - 6 ) on the road , while they have now won three of their last five games . They have now won four of their last four games , as they have now won five of their last five contests . Stephen Curry led the way for the Warriors with a game - high 40 points on 15 - of - 27 shooting , including 5 - of - 13 from long range , to go along with six assists , three rebounds , one steal and one block , in 42 minutes . Zach Randolph added 27 points , 11 rebounds and six assists , in 35 minutes , while Klay Thompson chipped in 17 points on 7 - of - 17 shooting , along with six rebounds , in 42 minutes off the bench . The Grizzlies shot 49 percent from the field , including 39 percent from long range , as they cruised to the win . Mike Conley was the high - point man for the Warriors , with 27 points , along with 12 assists , four rebounds and one steal , in 41 minutes . Marc Gasol added 23 points , five rebounds , three assists and one steal . Tony Allen chipped in 11 points , 12 rebounds , six assists and six steals , in 48 minutes .
